attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Nuclear power is the dirtiest form of electricity generation because of the problem of safely disposing of its waste, which has a 'half-life' of many thousands of years.
People who live near a nuclear power station inevitably receive a dose of radiation when there is a leak; which probably happens at least annually. The whole area around a nuclear power station is a no go area as far as I am concerned, especially in the direction of the prevailing wind. Everyone knows that if you live near a nuclear power station, the leukeamia which your child may be suffering from is caused by the radiation in the area.
Also, nuclear reactors can explode, for example: Chenobyl in 1986! Fallout from that reached Britain, many hundreds of miles away and contaminated farmland. Just imagine the consequences if a nuclear reactor exploded in Britain! Simply, it could make a large area of Britain uninhabitable for thousands of years!!!!
I request that tax payers' money be used to replace nuclear power stations with renewable energy sources: wind farms, tidal barrages (perhaps across the River Severn Estuary, other estuaries, bays, coves and the Solent), hydro-electric dams and solar power.
